channel.title: Incorrect info in wiki
channel.description:
Hi Imperium.I noticed that some information in wiki and in game class cards are incorrect.Also wiki could be more detailed. ToS wiki is very well done (better than game). Can you improve it? Thanks
P.S. I love your game and players :) keep doing good work :) and sorry for my english :)

item.title: Incorrect info in wiki
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
I would say, since the Game itself is currently in Alpha and the only thing that matters is ironing out Bugs, anything on the Class Cards can be updated after

That’s not to say we don’t appreciate you pointing it out, 'cause we do <3 It’s good to have eagle eyes!

Read full topic

item.title: Incorrect info in wiki
item.dc:creator: Elymas
item.description:
King’s card show old night actions.Alch card said Tar potion has only two uses.Troll box too and more. Sorry if I am wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Incorrect info in wiki
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
Elymas:

Hi Imperium.I noticed that some information in wiki and in game class cards are incorrect.Also wiki could be more detailed. ToS wiki is very well done (better than game). Can you improve it? Thanks

This is really generic/vague info O__o I can’t really do much with this. Wikia is also a public wiki: information can be updated by anyone, if you found a mistake.

Currently, the only known discrepancy is that the class cards say “Black Rose” instead of “Unseen”. We will update it soon™.

Read full topic

item.title: Incorrect info in wiki
item.dc:creator: Bounty
item.description:
Can you at least what’s wrong and which cards have incorrect information ? Do you mean the black rose ? That will be updated later.

Read full topic

item.title: Incorrect info in wiki

item.description:
Hmm sorry for that.I did not think anyone caught it.But I think that misinformation about game mechanic is quite important.Sorry for your time.
